document.full_text: the kansas city royals knocked down robinson cano then pushed past the rest of his new york yankees team mates to defeat the pinstripes 4-3 in the 11th inning on wednesday.
document.title: royals knock out wobbly yankees
lines_and_colors: the kansas city royals knocked down robinson cano then pushed past the rest of his new york yankees team mates to defeat the pinstripes 4-3 in the 11th inning on wednesday.
